full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYIS RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BSTOD DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA GCIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BRTAGS @005A *, ,NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMON BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES PA BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LANG PHAN MI SRID SNYAM PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA NAS RTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
